title: "why don't young people care about [current crisis]?"
preview_text:
we survived a pandemic. record inflation. a housing crisis. a banking collapse. and now AI is replacing half the workforce.
all before 30.
and WW3 trends on twitter every 3 months and we just scroll

title: The permanent underclass is real
preview_text:
